item.title: Install
item.description: Install next.js npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer npx tailwindcss init -p Configure your template paths Add the paths to all of your template files in your tailwind.config.js file. tailwind.config.js module.exports = { content: [ "./pages/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}", "./components/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}", ], theme: { extend: {}, }, plugins: [], } Add the Tailwind directives to your CSS Add the @tailwind directives for each of Tailwind’s layers to your ./styles/globals.css file. @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities; Install sveltekit npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer npx tailwindcss init tailwind.
